about.awards:
FWA (52)
Awwwards (11)
Cannes (15)
Webby (4)
Oneshow (5)
Emmy (2)
DNAD (5)
ADC (3)
about.description:
I strive to make the best digital experiences.

Our websites, apps, installations, RV & AR experiences
are all meticulously crafted in house by a tightly
integrated team of designers and developers. We
work with a specialized toolset which consistently
delivers award winning work through performance,
efficiency and attention to detail.

lab.title: World Brush
lab.name: World Brush
lab.details: World Brush is an AR experience that lets users paint on the world for others to discover. Every painting is anonymous and only visible where it was created. Users have the ability to like, dislike and report paintings which helps hide the bad stuff and showcase the good stuff for others.
lab.tech: Native AR built with Web Technology

lab.title: Neon Tubes
lab.name: Neon
lab.details: I've developed an installation for our 2017 holiday party in order to explore complex 3D graphics techniques in the form of swarming neon tubes. The visuals could be controlled via a Kinect, but when idle would be generated by interaction data collected from users from around the world.

lab.title: AR Experiments
lab.name: AR Experiments
lab.details: We’ve been thinking about Augmented Reality and how it fits with the future of the web. As a new paradigm it is without a doubt going to change how people interact with technology and like VR, the fundamental concept of AR is interacting with 3D graphics which is our primary passion.
lab.tech: Native AR app built with JavaScript and OpenGL

lab.title: Finding Love
lab.name: Finding Love
lab.details: Finding Love is a fully interactive, Virtual Reality story that transforms emotions into art. Moving through five distinct chapters, you experience the journey purely through visuals and sound.

lab.title: Neve AR
lab.name: Neve AR
lab.details: Enjoy the winter season with Neve, an experiment that takes the wonder of a snow globe into AR with enchanting elements such as a real time aurora borealis, orbiting stars and falling snowflakes.
lab.tech: Native AR app built on ARCore

lab.title: Mira
lab.name: Mira
lab.details: Created to explore cross platform development, Mira is a meditation experience that lets users create relaxing sounds and particles just by touching the screen. Working on the web, native mobile apps,  Apple TV,  VR, and as a physical installation, Mira brings the web outside of the browser.
lab.tech: Native iOS / Android apps built with JavaScript

lab.title: Finding Home
lab.name: Finding Home
lab.details: Finding Home is an exploration in using a flat-shaded low-poly style in WebGL. In the journey, the user flies over the sea, creates mountains from their fingers, and paints a galaxy with motion.

lab.title: WebVR Experiments
lab.name: WebVR Experiments
lab.details: Using an experimental version of Chromium, the engine that powers Chrome, we created early VR experiences for Vive and Oculus rendering in WebVR with WebGL and Three.js. Our exploration yielded a VR-specific renderer that enables visual effects rendered for each eye.

work.title: ~ AD ~
work.name: ~ AD ~
work.details: In collaboration with Pottermore, we built a fully interactive 3D Hogwarts that allowed users to explore the world of Harry Potter.

work.title: ~ CSE ~
work.details: A game that teaches players what the U.S. Air Force is all about. Set in a futuristic, holographic environment, players complete a series of missions to learn what it’s like to be an Airman.
work.name: ~ CSE ~

work.title: ~ CE ~
work.name: ~ CE ~
work.details: We brought Google I/O attendees and fans around the world together in a moment of discovery and gameplay. Using a microphone or touch device, users were able to send a bubble into the world and view the origins of other users’ bubbles.

work.title: ~ ECE ~
work.name: ~ ECE ~
work.details: We created a visually immersive quiz in a 3D environment that allowed people to discover their own personalised Patronus guardian from the Harry Potter universe.

work.title: ~ EEE ~
work.name: ~ EEE ~
work.details: A microsite that allowed millions of Spotify users to relive their listening habits from 2017 and share it with friends on social media.

work.title: ~ ME ~
work.name: ~ ME ~
work.details: We worked closely with emerging electronic music artist Emmit Fenn to create 9 unique WebGL visuals to accompany each track on his EP.

work.title: ~ MR ~
work.name: ~ MR ~
work.details: At Google I/O 2016, users in 150 countries caught and created planes, bringing people together from around the world to celebrate the event. Attendees used a mobile device to fold, stamp and throw a plane into the 50-ft screen on stage. So far, 4.5 million planes have been created
work.tech: Global Experience, Android & Progressive Web App

work.title: ~ RA ~
work.name: ~ RA ~
work.details: Racer is a multi-player, multi-device Chrome Experiment. A retro-style slot car game spanning across up to 5 phones or tablets, Android or iOS.

work.title: ~ BSH ~
work.name: ~ BSH ~
work.details: An eerie digital experience to promote the launch of Porter Robinson's latest EP "Virtual Self". Hidden ASCII code, secret interactions and cryptic text input added to the ambience.
